text: Anata gataga tsuma o rikon shite sadame rareta kigen ga manryō shitanaraba, kōheina taigū de dōkyo sa seru ka, matawa shinsetsu ni shite wakare nasai. Ka no on'na o komara su tame ni hiki tomete,-hō o koete wa naranai. Son'na koto o suru mono wa, jibun no tamashī o son'u monodearu. Gurō shite, arrā no o tsuge o tawamure-goto ni shite wa naranai. Anata gata ni taisuru arrā no onkei o nen i, mata anata gata ni sadzuke rareta, anata gata ni kankoku suru Keisuke to eichi o nen e. Arrā o osore nasai. Arrā wa subete no koto o shiri tsukusa rete iru koto o shire
